languages.text: Позиция, на которую назначается офицер корабля, отвечающий за определенные корабельные системы. На один пост можно назначить две обычные {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} и одну {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}особую{/g}. За один {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} можно использовать только одну способность каждого поста. Время, необходимое для {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}восстановления{/g} способности после использования, определяется случайно и может занимать до трех ходов. С повышением уровня корабля можно открывать новые способности постов.

A position for assigning one of the ship's officers who will then take charge of some of the ship's systems. Each post can have up to two basic {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and one {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}ultimate ability{/g} assigned to it. Only one ability from each post can be used per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} time before an ability can be used again is determined randomly and can take up to 3 rounds. You can gain access to new post abilities by increasing your ship's level.
languages.original_text: Позиция, на которую назначается офицер корабля, отвечающий за определенные корабельные системы. На один пост можно назначить две обычные {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} и одну {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}особую{/g}. За один {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} можно использовать только одну способность каждого поста. Время, необходимое для {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}восстановления{/g} способности после использования, определяется случайно и может занимать до трех ходов. С повышением уровня корабля можно открывать новые способности постов.

traits.locale_text: A position for assigning one of the ship's officers who will then take charge of some of the ship's systems. Each post can have up to two basic abilities and one {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}ultimate ability{/g} assigned to it. Only one ability from each post can be used per round. The cooldown time before an ability can be used again is determined randomly and can take up to 3 rounds. You can gain access to new post abilities by increasing your ship's level.

Each post can have up to two basic abilities and one {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}ultimate ability{/g} assigned to it. Only one ability from each post can be used per round. The cooldown time before an ability can be used again is determined randomly and can take up to 3 rounds. You can gain access to new post abilities by increasing your ship's level.

The cooldown time before an ability can be used again is determined randomly and can take up to 3 rounds. You can gain access to new post abilities by increasing your ship's level.

A position for assigning one of the ship's officers who will then take charge of some of the ship's systems. Each post can have up to two basic {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and one {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}ultimate ability{/g} assigned to it. Only one ability from each post can be used per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} time before an ability can be used again is determined randomly and can take up to 3 rounds. You can gain access to new post abilities by increasing your ship's level.

languages.text: Ein Posten, der einem der Schiffsoffiziere zugewiesen wird, der dann die Verantwortung für einige der Schiffssysteme übernimmt. Jedem Posten können bis zu zwei {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Grundfähigkeiten{/g} und eine {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}ultimative Fähigkeit{/g} zugewiesen werden. Pro Runde kann nur eine Fähigkeit von jedem {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Posten{/g} eingesetzt werden. Die {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g}, bevor eine Fähigkeit wieder eingesetzt werden kann, wird zufällig bestimmt und kann bis zu 3 Runden dauern. Wenn du die Stufe deines Schiffes erhöhst, erhältst du Zugang zu neuen Posten-Fähigkeiten.
languages.original_text: A position for assigning one of the ship's officers who will then take charge of some of the ship's systems. Each post can have up to two basic {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and one {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}ultimate ability{/g} assigned to it. Only one ability from each post can be used per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} time before an ability can be used again is determined randomly and can take up to 3 rounds. You can gain access to new post abilities by increasing your ship's level.

traits.locale_text: Ein Posten, der einem der Schiffsoffiziere zugewiesen wird, der dann die Verantwortung für einige der Schiffssysteme übernimmt. Jedem {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}Posten{/g} können bis zu zwei {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Grundfähigkeiten{/g} und eine ultimative Fähigkeit zugewiesen werden. Pro Runde kann nur eine Fähigkeit von jedem {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Posten{/g} eingesetzt werden. Die {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g}, bevor eine Fähigkeit wieder eingesetzt werden kann, wird zufällig bestimmt und kann bis zu 3 Runden dauern. Wenn du die Stufe deines Schiffes erhöhst, erhältst du Zugang zu neuen Posten-Fähigkeiten.

languages.text: Fonction permettant d'affecter l'un des officiers du vaisseau qui prendra alors en charge certains systèmes du vaisseau. Chaque poste peut se voir attribuer jusqu'à deux {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} de base et une {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}capacité ultime{/g}. Une seule capacité par poste peut être utilisée lors d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Le temps de {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}recharge{/g} avant de pouvoir réutiliser une capacité est déterminé de manière aléatoire et peut prendre jusqu'à 3 rounds. Vous pouvez accéder à de nouvelles capacités de poste en augmentant le niveau de votre vaisseau.
languages.original_text: A position for assigning one of the ship's officers who will then take charge of some of the ship's systems. Each post can have up to two basic {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and one {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}ultimate ability{/g} assigned to it. Only one ability from each post can be used per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} time before an ability can be used again is determined randomly and can take up to 3 rounds. You can gain access to new post abilities by increasing your ship's level.

traits.locale_text: Fonction permettant d'affecter l'un des officiers du vaisseau qui prendra alors en charge certains systèmes du vaisseau. Chaque {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}poste{/g} peut se voir attribuer jusqu'à deux {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} de base et une capacité ultime. Une seule capacité par poste peut être utilisée lors d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Le délai de {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}récupération{/g} permettant de réutiliser une capacité est déterminé de manière aléatoire et peut prendre jusqu'à 3 rounds. Vous pouvez accéder à de nouvelles capacités de poste en augmentant le niveau de votre vaisseau.

languages.text: 指派一名军官，负责船上某个系统的职位。每个职位最多可以拥有两个基础{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}与一个{g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}终极能力{/g}。每个职位每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中只能使用一种能力。每种能力的{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}随机决定，最长可能会长达三轮。您可以提高虚空舰的等级，解锁新的职位能力。
languages.original_text: A position for assigning one of the ship's officers who will then take charge of some of the ship's systems. Each post can have up to two basic {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and one {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}ultimate ability{/g} assigned to it. Only one ability from each post can be used per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} time before an ability can be used again is determined randomly and can take up to 3 rounds. You can gain access to new post abilities by increasing your ship's level.

traits.locale_text: 指派一名军官，负责船上某个系统的职位。每个{g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}职位{/g}最多可以拥有两个基础{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}与一个终极能力。每个职位每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中只能使用一种能力。每种能力的{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}随机决定，最长可能会长达三轮。您可以提高虚空舰的等级，解锁新的职位能力。

languages.original_text: A position for assigning one of the ship's officers who will then take charge of some of the ship's systems. Each post can have up to two basic abilities and one {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}ultimate ability{/g} assigned to it. Only one ability from each post can be used per round. The cooldown time before an ability can be used again is determined randomly and can take up to 3 rounds. You can gain access to new post abilities by increasing your ship's level.

languages.text: Una posición que puedes asignar a cualquiera de los oficiales para que se encargue de algunos de los sistemas de la nave. Cada puesto puede tener asignadas hasta dos {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} básicas y una {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}capacidad definitiva{/g}. Solo se puede usar una capacidad por cada puesto en cada {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. El tiempo de {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}recuperación{/g} antes de poder volver a usar una capacidad se determina aleatoriamente y tiene un máximo de 3 asaltos. Puedes obtener acceso a nuevas capacidades de puesto aumentando el nivel de tu nave.
languages.original_text: A position for assigning one of the ship's officers who will then take charge of some of the ship's systems. Each post can have up to two basic {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and one {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}ultimate ability{/g} assigned to it. Only one ability from each post can be used per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} time before an ability can be used again is determined randomly and can take up to 3 rounds. You can gain access to new post abilities by increasing your ship's level.

traits.locale_text: Una posición que puedes asignar a cualquiera de los oficiales para que se encargue de algunos de los sistemas de la nave. Cada {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}puesto{/g} puede tener asignadas hasta dos {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} básicas y una capacidad definitiva. Solo se puede usar una capacidad por cada puesto en cada {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. El tiempo de {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}recuperación{/g} antes de poder volver a usar una capacidad se determina aleatoriamente y tiene un máximo de 3 asaltos. Puedes obtener acceso a nuevas capacidades de puesto aumentando el nivel de tu nave.

languages.text: 船のシステムの一部を担当する船の士官を任命するための役割。各ポストには基本{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を最大2つ、{g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}究極アビリティ{/g}を1つ割り当てることができる。{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}ごとに各ポストから使用できるアビリティは1つのみ。アビリティが再び使えるようになるまでの{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}時間はランダムに決定され、最大で3ラウンドかかる。船のレベルを上げることにより新しい役職アビリティが解放される。
languages.original_text: A position for assigning one of the ship's officers who will then take charge of some of the ship's systems. Each post can have up to two basic {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and one {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}ultimate ability{/g} assigned to it. Only one ability from each post can be used per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} time before an ability can be used again is determined randomly and can take up to 3 rounds. You can gain access to new post abilities by increasing your ship's level.

traits.locale_text: 船のシステムの一部を担当する船の士官を任命するための役割。各{g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}ポスト{/g}には基本{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を最大2つ、究極アビリティを1つ割り当てることができる。{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}ごとに各ポストから使用できるアビリティは1つのみ。アビリティが再び使えるようになるまでの{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}時間はランダムに決定され、最大で3ラウンドかかる。船のレベルを上げることにより新しい役職アビリティが解放される。

languages.text: Belirli bazı gemi sistemlerini idare etmesi için geminin subaylarından birini atayabileceğin bir pozisyon. Her bir mevkiye en fazla iki temel {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g} ve bir de {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}üstün kabiliyet{/g} atanabilir. Her mevki, bir {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} sadece bir kabiliyet kullanabilir. Bir kabiliyetin yeniden kullanılabilmesi için gereken {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}dolum süresi{/g} rastgele belirlenir ve en fazla 3 raunt sürebilir. Geminin seviyesini artırarak yeni mevki kabiliyetlerine erişim kazanabilirsin.
languages.original_text: A position for assigning one of the ship's officers who will then take charge of some of the ship's systems. Each post can have up to two basic {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and one {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}ultimate ability{/g} assigned to it. Only one ability from each post can be used per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} time before an ability can be used again is determined randomly and can take up to 3 rounds. You can gain access to new post abilities by increasing your ship's level.
